thread.title: Actress proclaims love on social media
thread.title_full: Actress proclaims love on social media - The Times of India

author: Prathibha Joy
title: Actress proclaims love on social media
text:
It is not often that actresses publicly acknowledge having a love life, often hiding behind the 'we are good friends' tag. So it is heartening when there are others who boldly proclaim being in love. Take, for instance, Sangeetha Bhat, who recently updated her relationship status on a social networking site. 'In a relationship with Sudarshan Rangaprasad', read her status.
When we reached out to the actress, she said, "Sudarshan is an engineer-turned-actor. He dabbles with theatre, but does films too. He had worked with Pavan Wadeyar, my hero in Preeti Geeti Ityadi (PGI), and on Googly. We met on the set of PGI, in which he played my ex-boyfriend," says Sangeetha, who is currently shooting for Aniruddha and a Tamil film.
